display_help: Use this power to give you a pop-up window which will explain your role as the Thief. This power will remain with you throughout the Heist. Recharge: Very Fast
display_target_help: Use this power to give you a pop-up window which will explain your role as the Thief. This power will remain with you throughout the Heist.
display_confirm: As the Thief in the Heist of Tyrant's Palace, your first duty involves stealing crucial items from the office of the casino chief of security Ted Dubois that will give an edge to your team. Your second duty will be to infiltrate the vault, with assistance from the Grifter and the Hitter. A security grid of lasers, which can be partially deactivated by the Hitter, will obstruct your progress and the Vault will not be accessible until the Grifter has retrieved the passphrase from Ted Dubois, Chief of Security.
